# Pre-requisites 

- Git: Installation guide can be found [here](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Getting-Started-Installing-Git).

- Access to [Github](https://www.github.com): Resources for the course are hosted on Github.

- Docker & docker-compose. (docker-compose must support version:"2").

- Npm installed in your computer.
